title: How to stop a jammer device in a specific area - Quora

response.answer_text: First you’ve got to find it—that’s the hard part. Then you have to get access to it. This can be hard as well, depending on the location & if you already have access to there. Disabling it is usually pretty easy—disconnect it from power, either line or batteries (or both).

You can find it by using an antenna and a signal strength meter. Once you find it, disable it in any way that you can. Then call the regulating agency and report it. (If you are in the USA, the FCC would be the one you call.)
